Module nl.naturalis.common
Package nl.naturalis.common

Class CollectionMethods

java.lang.Object
nl.naturalis.common.CollectionMethods
public class CollectionMethods
extends Object
Methods extending the Java Collection framework.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static <T> List<T> ifEmpty​(List<T> list, T e0)
    Returns the specified list if it is not empty else an immutable list containing only the specified element.
    static <T> List<T> ifEmpty​(List<T> list, T e0, T e1, T... moreElems)
    Returns the specified list if it is not empty else an immutable list containing the specified elements.

    Returns the specified set if it is not empty else an immutable set containing only the specified element.

    Returns the specified set if it is not empty else an immutable set containing the specified elements.

    Left-shifts the provided list by the specified number of elements.

    Returns a sublist containing all but the last element of the provided list.

    Returns a sublist containing all but the last by elements of the provided list.

    • saturatedEnumMap

      public static <K extends Enum<K>,​ V,​ M extends EnumMap<K,​ ? super V>> M saturatedEnumMap​(Class<K> enumClass, V... values) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns a mutable EnumMap with all enum constants set to non-null values. The number if values must exactly equal the number of enum constants and they are assigned according to ordinal number. This method throws an IllegalArgumentException if the number of values is not exactly equal to the number of constants in the enum class, or if any of the values is null.
      Type Parameters:
      K - The key type
      V - The value type
      Parameters:
      enumClass - The enum class
      values - The values to assign to the
      Returns:
      A fully-occupied EnumMap with no null-values
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if enumClass or Values is null, or if any of the provided values is null

    • tightHashMap

    • shrink

      public static <T> List<T> shrink​(List<T> list)
      Returns a sublist containing all but the last element of the provided list. The returned list is backed the original list, so changing its elements will affect the original list as well.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the elements in the list
      Parameters:
      list - The list to shrink
      Returns:
      A sublist containing all but the last element of the provided list

    • shrink

      public static <T> List<T> shrink​(List<T> list, int by)
      Returns a sublist containing all but the last by elements of the provided list. The returned list is backed the original list, so changing its elements will affect the original list as well.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the elements in the list
      Parameters:
      list - The list to shrink
      by - The number of elements by which to shrink the list
      Returns:
      A sublist containing all but the last by elements of the provided list

    • shift

      Type Parameters:

    • shift

      public static <T> List<T> shift​(List<T> list, int by)
      Left-shifts the provided list by the specified number of elements. The returned list is backed the original list, so changing its elements will affect the original list as well.
      Type Parameters:
      T -
      Parameters:
      list -
      by -
      Returns:

    • sublist

      public static <T> List<T> sublist​(List<T> list, int from, int length)
      Returns a sublist of the provided list starting with starting with element from and containing at most length elements. The returned list is backed the original list, so changing its elements will affect the original list as well.

      1. If from is negative, it is taken relative to the end of the list.
      2. If length is negative, the sublist is taken in the opposite direction, with from now becoming the last element of the sublist
      Parameters:
      list - The List to extract a sublist from
      from - The start index (however, see above)
      length - The length of the sublist
      Returns:
      A sublist of the provided list
